1370: Hardenbernus moved to Die lange straet2.A.2 after marriage.
Got married to Amalburga at age 21 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Amalburga, Gertrudis, at age 21.
1371: Had a son with Amalburga, Menzone, at age 22.
1372: Had a son with Amalburga, Wilmarus, at age 23.
1375: Had a daughter with Amalburga, Ghodelde, at age 26.
1376: Lost son Wilmarus when Wilmarus was 5 years old.
1377: Had a son with Amalburga, Godefridus, at age 28.
1379: Lost son Willem when Willem was 0 years old.
Amalburga gave birth to their stillborn son Willem in 1379.
